snippet.title: Code of Princess EX Nintendo Switch Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: Code of Princess EX brings a unique combination of beat-'em-up action and role-playing depth to Nintendo Switch! Fans of both genres are sure to be captivated by the saga of Princess Solange and her epic adventure of intense multiplane fantasy combat, with a roster of over 50 playable characters, all of whom can be upgraded with new abilities and equipment. The game's Campaign mode supports local two-player co-op, and there are also options for both competitive and cooperative online play. Developed by Studio Saizensen with a story and character designs by legendary artist Kinu Nishimura, plus contributions from the creative team behind Guardian Heroes, the original hack-and-slash RPG adventure! Coming this summer to retail shelves and the Nintendo eShop!
